title: “Floor Space Index” (F
clause_text: “Floor Space Index” (F.S.I.) or Floor Area Ratio (F.A.R.) shall mean the quotient obtained by dividing the combined built up area on all floors, (excepting the areas specifically exempted from computation of F.S.I. under the UDCPR and the said Regulations) by the area of the plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
